snippet: The Giants activated safety Will Hill and cornerback Charles James for Sunday’s game against the Eagles. Cornerback Aaron Ross was placed on injured reserve, ending his season.
abstract: New York Giants activate safety Will Hill and cornerback Charles James for game against Philadelphia Eagles; cornerback Aaron Ross is placed on injured reserve, ending his season.
lead_paragraph: The Giants activated safety Will Hill and cornerback Charles James for Sunday’s game against the Eagles. Cornerback Aaron Ross was placed on injured reserve, ending his season.

headline.main: Giants Lose Ross and Add Two to Secondary
headline.print_headline: Giants Lose Ross And Add Two To Secondary
